description: This file defines and configures an AI agent and a web application interface for it, using classes from the agno package. It sets up an agent with OpenAI's GPT-4 model, wraps it in an AGUI application, and runs the app server.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific instructions and model configuration.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

classes.name: AGUIApp
classes.description: Represents an AGUI web application interface for the agent.

methods.name: agui_app.serve
methods.description: Starts the web server to serve the AGUI application.
